mapper.select: SELECT r1.* ,r2.comment_no sub_comment_no ,r2.board_no sub_board_no ,r2.user_id sub_user_id ,r2.content sub_content ,r2.group_no sub_group_no ,r2.parent_no sub_parent_no ,r2.depth_no sub_depth_no ,r2.seq_no sub_seq_no ,r2.sub_cnt sub_sub_cnt ,r2.reg_date sub_reg_date ,r2.upd_date sub_upd_date ,u.nickname FROM users u, comment r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM comment WHERE comment_no <> group_no ) r2 ON r1.group_no = r2.group_no WHERE r1.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY r1.group_no ASC ,r1.seq_no ASC ,r1.depth_no ASC ,r1.reg_date DESC

SELECT r1.* ,r2.comment_no sub_comment_no ,r2.user_id sub_user_id ,r2.content sub_content ,r2.board_no sub_board_no ,r2.group_no sub_group_no ,r2.parent_no sub_parent_no ,r2.depth_no sub_depth_no ,r2.seq_no sub_seq_no ,r2.reg_date sub_reg_date ,r2.upd_date sub_upd_date ,r2.sub_cnt sub_sub_cnt ,u.nickname FROM comment r1 LEFT JOIN users u ON r1.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM comment WHERE comment_no <> group_no ) r2 ON r1.group_no = r2.group_no WHERE (r1.board_no = #{boardNo} AND r1.user_id = u.user_id) OR (r1.board_no = #{boardNo} AND r1.user_id LIKE '삭제%') ORDER BY r1.group_no ASC ,r1.seq_no ASC ,r1.depth_no ASC ,r1.reg_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( user_id, content, board_no, group_no, parent_no, depth_no, seq_no ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{content}, #{boardNo}, #{groupNo}, #{parentNo}, #{depthNo}, #{seqNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET content = #{content}, group_no = #{groupNo}, parent_no = #{parentNo}, depth_no = #{depthNo}, seq_no = #{seqNo}, upd_date = now() WHERE comment_no = #{commentNo}
UPDATE comment SET sub_cnt = sub_cnt + #{no} WHERE comment_no = #{parentNo}
